entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
